name: Tyler Perry's Bruh
overview: This dramedy follows four longtime friends as they navigate life and relationships through the strength of their brother-like bond. In a society where relationships between men of color are often misjudged and misrepresented, the series embraces male vulnerability versus hypermasculinity.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Four friends rely on one another as they begin to ponder the possibilities of building relationships that could lead to marriage and family. Fighting their own quirks and demons, they comically navigate their journeys through relationships and careers.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: John invites his three college buddies to join him in a new business venture.

episodes.name: My Own Two Feet
episodes.overview: John strives to prove to his mother and friends that he can stand on his own two feet.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.overview: John asks for help, putting Tom, Mike and Bill at odds.

episodes.name: On My Own
episodes.overview: Bill is confronted with his true feelings about an ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Hamster Wheel
episodes.overview: Peter interrupts Regina and Bill's heart-to-heart, Tom tries to keep John from making a mistake, Regina goes to Alice for advice, and Mike sees Pam out with another guy.

episodes.name: In Debt
episodes.overview: The truth comes out about a dark secret in the four friend's past.

episodes.name: The Cute Ones
episodes.overview: Mike tries to repay John for taking the fall for him back in college, Regina questions the sincerity of Bill's feelings, and Tom's bad behavior at work catches up to him.

episodes.name: My Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: An incident puts Tom's career in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Twenty-Four Hours
episodes.overview: Mike secretly shows up for his friend and saves his life.

episodes.name: A Lone Wolf
episodes.overview: John's love life and professional life start looking up after Leon severs their business relationship, and Mike tries to patch things up with Pamela.

episodes.name: The Double Standard
episodes.overview: Mike considers making a serious commitment.

episodes.name: Dogs in the Snow
episodes.overview: Bill decides to follow his heart despite a growing controversy.

episodes.name: White Horse
episodes.overview: The four friends are involved in catastrophic events.

episodes.name: A Fool In Love
episodes.overview: Bill fights for a lost love.

episodes.name: In the Past
episodes.overview: Mike steps into uncharted waters

episodes.name: Better Late Than Never
episodes.overview: Bill makes a move to show Regina how he feels about her. Tom tries to help a patient get away from her abusive husband, and Pamela begins having doubts when Mike changes plans on her at the last minute.

episodes.name: Nelly
episodes.overview: Pam goes to Alice for advice. John gets an unexpected visitor. Elsewhere, Tom questions a senior doctor about the treatments he prescribes his patients and Mike tries to charm a female colleague.

episodes.name: Bad Cologne
episodes.overview: Mike is caught in a compromising position.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Four friends rely on one another as they begin to ponder the possibilities of building relationships that could lead to marriage and family. Fighting their own quirks and demons, they comically navigate their journeys through relationships and careers.

episodes.name: I Love LA
episodes.overview: Leah reaches out to Tom for help. Bill is planning a big move to prove his love.

episodes.name: There She Go
episodes.overview: A choice Bill makes gets him into trouble. Mike cannot come to terms with his feelings.

episodes.name: The Coffee Date
episodes.overview: An old friend of the Bruhs moves to Atlanta. Alice is concerned about her health.

episodes.name: Receipts
episodes.overview: Regina seeks advice from Alice. Regina Considers filing a lawsuit.

episodes.name: The Code
episodes.overview: Bill is tested by the women in his life. John has a difficult conversation with Alice. Bill is reluctant to confront Mike.

episodes.name: More Than a Peck
episodes.overview: Alice has an idea to improve business. Bill's conversation with Mike doesn't turn out as he expected. Tom and John make plans to fix the issues within the brotherhood.

episodes.name: High School
episodes.overview: Greg explores possibilities with a neighbor. Littia and John communicate about their future. Mike isn't dealing with his emotions and instead chooses to lash and act out.

episodes.name: The Flower Child
episodes.overview: Mike seeks revenge which makes John nervous. Regina uses Bill.

episodes.name: An Eye for An Eye
episodes.overview: Mike carries out his revenge. John learns the meaning of eye for and eye. Mike tries to involve Regina in one of his schemes.

episodes.name: The Long Journey
episodes.overview: Regina demands proof from Mike of his accusation. Tom receives some disturbing news. Tom asks Greg for a big favor. Regina helps Mike to see that things aren't always what they seem.

episodes.name: One Chance
episodes.overview: Mike apologizes to Regina. Regina makes a big move with Bill. Alice shares life altering information with Greg.

episodes.name: Like the Wind
episodes.overview: Alice is upset about her doctor's informal diagnosis. Pamela is floored when Mike decides to be completely transparent with her

episodes.name: What I Feel
episodes.overview: Darla slows down Greg's advances. Mike is keeping a deep-rooted secret from the brotherhood. John finds out shocking news about Littia.

episodes.name: Tomorrow Comes
episodes.overview: Bill has second thoughts about getting married, John has concerns about Littia's past, Mike refuses Pam's help, and Greg has an unexpected encounter at the hospital.

episodes.name: Cold Feet
episodes.overview: Regina gives Bill an ultimatum, Pam confides in Greg about Mike's substance use, John tries to distance himself from Littia, and Bill goes to Natalie for advice.

episodes.name: The Appointed Time
episodes.overview: Mike has a setback, Pam reveals a painful incident from her past, Greg hits Bill with some hard truth, and Greg and John confront Mike about his substance use.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: Mike acts on a huge decision and finds support in Pamela. Regina follows her heart instead of her mind. Bill realizes he has a real problem.

episodes.name: Around Each Corner
episodes.overview: Littia's actions are causing John discomfort. Mike is being difficult and resistant to Natalie's help. John must decide to speak up.

episodes.name: It's Just Dinner
episodes.overview: Darla has a secret that changes Greg's opinion of her. John debates whether or not to confront Greg. Littia and John have a candid conversation.

episodes.name: The Dog House
episodes.overview: While John finds himself tangled up in Littia's sexual schemes, Bill has second thoughts about his recent choice to get married and goes to Mike for advice.

episodes.name: The Morning After
episodes.overview: Littia debriefs Alice about her night, John approaches Greg about Darla's identity, and Bill is weighing his relationship options when he receives an unexpected houseguest.

episodes.name: Human To Human
episodes.overview: Regina's mother attempts to move into Bill's apartment, John confides in Alice about Littia's pregnancy plans, and Greg and Darla's first date makes them both anxious.

episodes.name: Control
episodes.overview: John and Alice devise a plan to get Littia out of the picture, Mike struggles with his sobriety, and Greg considers taking his relationship with Darla to the next level.

episodes.name: In The Blink Of An Eye
episodes.overview: Greg learns that John and Darla have a past, Alice advises Littia on getting John's attention, Mike and Pam reconnect, and Bill's sex life suffers when Regina's mom comes to visit.

episodes.name: Honesty is Best
episodes.overview: John sets boundaries with Littia, Regina gets marriage advice from her mom, Greg struggles with his feelings for Darla, and sparks fly when Bill meets Claudia.

episodes.name: Blueprints
episodes.overview: John suspects Littia is the culprit when his house gets broken into, Claudia pays Bill a tension-filled visit, and Greg confronts Tom about disrespecting his relationship with Darla.

episodes.name: Say What You Want
episodes.overview: Bill struggles with his connection to Claudia, Tom gets flirty with Dina at the office, and Darla challenges Greg over his dodgy behavior in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Set Up
episodes.overview: Pamela encourages a reluctant Regina to spy on Bill, Bill has an encounter with Claudia, Darla and Dina gang up on Greg, and Alice and John demand answers from Littia.

episodes.name: Around and Around
episodes.overview: John is shocked when Littia stands up to Alice, Darla flaunts her handsome date in front of a jealous Greg, and Bill gets some disturbing news about Claudia's dangerous marriage.

episodes.name: A Wall Between Us
episodes.overview: John meets the real apartment-trashing culprit, Bill confides in a friend about his affair, Pamela warns Regina about her living situation, and Dina's naughty proposition leads to trouble.

episodes.name: Pound Cake
episodes.overview: Darla helps Tom and Greg out of a jam, Regina makes a deal with Bill regarding her mother, and Littia refuses to leave the sandwich shop until she gets an apology from John and Alice.

episodes.name: A Repeat
episodes.overview: Pamela warns Regina not to trust Bill, Greg confides in Tom about his ex-wife's financial demands, Regina introduces her mom to Alice, and Bill and Claudia make a horrifying discovery.

episodes.name: Between A Rock And A Hard Place
episodes.overview: Darla and Greg try to make a fresh start, Tom and John discuss their concerns about Mike and Bill, and Alice and Hilda discover a troublesome similarity.

episodes.name: Upside Down
episodes.overview: Hilda confronts Alice about her betrayal, Darla sends Greg mixed signals after their failed date, John deals with an unwanted houseguest, and Regina accuses Bill of cheating.

episodes.name: Dancing Around
episodes.overview: Regina fights for her relationship as cheating rumors swirl around Bill, Pam worries that Mike is facing a big setback, and Tom evades serious accusations about Bill's fidelity.

episodes.name: In A Hallway
episodes.overview: Dina attempts to make amends with Tom, Regina goes to Alice for advice, Pam confronts Mike about his money problems, and Claudia has a shocking proposal for Bill.

episodes.name: In Control
episodes.overview: Bill and Claudia discuss the boundaries of their affair, John gets held up by Alice's romantic antics at work, and Pam is determined to help Mike -- though it may be too late.

episodes.name: Troubled Waters
episodes.overview: Pam and John attempt to gather Mike's closest friends for an intervention, though Bill is distracted by his ongoing entanglement with Claudia and Regina's mounting suspicions.

episodes.name: Misery
episodes.overview: Tom and Greg try to revive Mike, Regina considers calling it quits in her marriage to Bill, and Hilda threatens to take Alice to small-claims court.

episodes.name: Locked Out
episodes.overview: As the friends await word on Mike's condition at the hospital, John gets an unexpected visitor, Alice tries to comfort Pam, and an inconsolable Bill lashes out at Regina.

episodes.name: A Signed Letter
episodes.overview: John delivers some hard truths to a friend who needs them, and the guys face a difficult decision after things come to a head with Mike.

episodes.name: A Fresh Start
episodes.overview: Pamela worries about Mike being faced with temptation when he hangs out with the Bruhs. Regina surprises Bill and disrupts his plans when she shows up to confront him.

episodes.name: Blessings
episodes.overview: Greg and Officer Grills must come to terms with their true feelings for one another and figure out how to move forward. Tom gets an offer that forces him to consider what his future could truly be.

episodes.name: Double Up
episodes.overview: Bill wants to give his relationship with Regina a second chance, John goes all-in on a questionable new business venture, and Tom makes a discovery that might mean trouble for Bill.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: Lionel is getting closer to solving the puzzle involving Claudia and her partner infidelity crime. Tom finally convinces a hesitant Katherine to come clean about the identity of Claudia's attacker.

episodes.name: Disconcerted
episodes.overview: Bill starts to feel the consequences of his secret relationship, Greg attempts to start over in his dating life, and John has a business proposal for his mom's new spiritual boyfriend.

episodes.name: Invest In Yourself
episodes.overview: Tom seeks advice from a colleague about how to help Claudia, John looks for new investors, and Greg tries to get his relationship with Officer Grills back on track.
